Make sure your landscape is full of healthy plants with beautiful blooms with Jobe's Fertilizer Spikes for Potted Plants & Hanging Baskets. Convenient and easy to use, Jobe's fertilizer spikes provide nutrition underground at the roots where plants can actually use it.
